name: Vampire Corpse Feast
description:
Vampire Corpse Feast

As Butler 13 you are tasked with satisfying the Zamfir family, a group of quirky vampires, that need tasks done so they can all enjoy their feast. They are so happy to have you for dinner!

Made in GB Studio in about 3 days.

Credits:

Ahria Nicholas - Programmer

Hogan Coverdale - Writer and Designer

Charlie Klever - Story and Level Designer

Caitlin McBride - Level Programmer

CONTROLS:

Z - A Button

X - B Button

Enter - Start Button

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement
